description: While carrying on their usual chases, Tom and Jerry inadvertently stow-away on a spaceship bound for Mars.
keywords: reference to arnold schwarzenegger,spacesuit,tom the cat character,jerry the mouse character,spike character
name: Tom and Jerry Blast Off to Mars!

original_info.id: Tom and Jerry: Blast Off to Mars_2004
original_info.name: Tom and Jerry: Blast Off to Mars

review.name: In the Beginning...
review.reviewBody: I saw this film yesterday this morning, and let me tell you, the opening scene was just hilarious! The living room was my favorite part, because of all those ancient artifacts inside. In my opinion, that's my idea of a living room. Too bad our favorite "friend-and-foe-alike" twosome let their antics make such an exquisite room go to waste! The kitchen part, however, was too commonplace. It's the same old iron-board, sink-full-of-dishes, flaming-oven-burners gag, etc., etc., etc.... at least I'm glad there's no lady of the house to give Tom a piece of her mind, no matter how we see her, be it full-body OR from the waist down.
